DOC.brief_summary: To determine maximum tolerate dose and/or maximum attainable dose vaccine consist adenovector express rat Her-2/neu patient metastatic locally recurrent breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Adenovirus Encoding Rat HER-2 Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer ( AdHER2.1 )
DOC.criteria: 1. metastatic locally recurrent breast cancer , 2 . 18 year age old , 3 . Her2/neu positive ( 3+ immunohistochemistry FISH + ) , 4 . One follow 1. currently receive hormonal therapy candidate , 2. consider trastuzumab , 3. cancer progress trastuzumab 1 . Pregnant lactating woman . 2 . Prior concurrent malignancy except treat basal cell squamous carcinoma skin situ cancer cervix cancer treat presume cured five year prior study entry . 3 . Currently receive chemotherapy , immunotherapy , adenoviral gene therapy biological cancer therapy . [ Note : concurrent hormonal therapy ( tamoxifen , aromatase inhibitor , megace ) permitted. ] . 4 . Treatment trastuzumab within 4 week prior first dose vaccine therapy . 5 . Hemoglobin < 80 g/L granulocyte < 1.5 x 109 /L lymphocyte < 1.0 x 109 /L platelet < 100 x 109 /L . 6 . Baseline liver enzyme ( AST ALT ) great 3 time upper limit normal great 5 time upper limit normal liver metastasis present and/or bilirubin great 50 mmol . 7 . CD4 cell < 0.5 x 109 /L 8 . Patients document brain metastasis . 9 . Patients acute illness would interfere vaccination 10 . Any patient require concurrent immunosuppressive therapy ( e.g . corticosteroid ) . 11 . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status > 2 . 12 . Patients life expectancy le 6 month . 13 . Geographic inaccessibility would preclude followup . Patients register trial must treat follow Jewish General Hospital . 14 . Failure give write informed consent . 15 . Baseline leave ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 55 % echocardiography MUGA scan .
